about_the_game:
This costume allows the male survivors (Tyrone, Samuel and Martin) to wear the outfit seen on rookie cop Leon S. Kennedy in Resident Evil 2 (2019).

Costumes can be selected in the Customize menu. You need to restart the game in order to see the costumes.

Note: These cosmetic items are for use exclusively with Resident Evil Resistance.

content_descriptors.notes: WARNING: This game contains strong language and extreme violence.
